data.title: ECS T10 2021, Match 21: ROP vs PIA Dream11 Prediction, Fantasy Cricket Tips, Playing XI, Pitch Report and Injury Update
data.meta_description: Check out the Royal Parma vs Pianoro Dream11 Prediction, playing XI updates, fantasy tips & much more for Match 21 of ECS T10 2021
data.text:
Match Details:

The 21st match of the ECS T10 2021 will be played Between Royal Parma and Pianoro on 27th March at Oval Rastignano in Bologna. The match is scheduled to start at 8:30 AM local time (1.00: PM IST) and it will be streamed live on Fancode.

Preview:

Royal Parma will take on Pianoroi n the 21st match of the ECS T10 on Saturday. Royal Parma have played two matches in the middle round robin so far, where they lost against Bologna by 7 runs in their first match and defeated Baracca Prato by 12 runs in the second match. It’s a must win game for Royal Parma to qualify for the semi-finals.

On the other hand, Pianoro have already qualify for the semi-finals. They have won both matches in the middle round robin. The last time these two teams faced each other, Royal Parma defeated Pianoro by 9 wickets.

ROP vs PIA Weather Report for Match 21:

The weather is predicted to be partly cloudy in Bologna with the temperature being around 14 degrees Celsius and humidity levels are a t51 per cent. There is 10% chances of precipitation for this match.

Pitch Condition/Report:

The pitch here at Oval Rastignano will usually provide good support to the batsmen, but pace bowlers will also get help from pitch due to cloudy weather. Batting first will be a good option on this pitch.

Average first innings score:

136 (Last 5 matches played on this venue)

Record of chasing teams:

Won – 2, Lost – 3, Tie – 0

Also Read – Cricket South Africa to allow IPL-bound players to leave Pakistan ODI series midway

Injury and Availability News:

(Will be added when there is an update)

ROP vs PIA Today’s Probable Playing XIs

Royal Parma

Rajmani Singh, Mehmoor Javed (wk), Harkamal Singh, Deependra Singh Shekhawat, Sukhpal Singh (c), Attiq Ur Rehman, Jaspal Ram, Mehboob Ahmed, Jabrar Afzal-I, Hardeep Singh-II, Sukhraj Singh

Bench:

Balwinder Singh, Sheraz Afzal, Prabhdeep Singh-I, Satvir Singh-II, Gurpreet Singh, Gouravjeet Singh

Pianoro

Waleed Rana, Charles Fernando, Nilantha Kotikawatta, Arslan Rana (c), Nicolo Fernando, Aravinth Suresh, Farhan Shafique, Hammad Amjad, Raheel Riaz (wk), Asim Khalid, Nasir Abbas

Bench:

Zeeshan Ahmed, Anam Mollik, Nisantha Anton, Shammi Mahendra, Muhammad Abuzar, Rakibull Hassan, Muhammad Abubakkar

ROP vs PIA Top Picks For Today’s Dream11 Match:

Rajmani Singh is the leading run-scorer for Royal Parma. He has scored 208 runs at a strike rate of 196.22 and also picked up 3 wickets from 10 overs.

Deependra Singh Shekhawat is a dynamic all-rounder who is known for his hard-hitting abilities. He has scored 128 runs at a staggering strike rate of 237.03 and also picked up 4 wickets from 11 overs.

Waleed Rana is the leading run-scorer and wicket-taker for Pianoro. He has scored 177 runs at a strike rate of 164.13 and has also picked up 10 wickets at an impressive economy of 6.07 runs per over.

Charles Fernando is the hard-hitting opening batsmen of Pianoro. He has scored 138 runs at a staggering strike rate of 300. He scored 110 runs in just 35 balls against Bologna in the last match.

Nicolo Fernando is a batting all-rounder who will bowl spin and will be used as a floater in batting. He has picked up 6 wickets and also scored 70 runs at a strike rate of 152.17.

Suggested Captain and Vice-captain option:

Captain Options – Rajmani Singh, Waleed Rana

Vice-captain Options – Deependra Singh Shekhawat, Charles Fernando

Suggested Playing XI No.1 for ROP vs PIA Dream11 Fantasy Cricket:

Keeper – Attiq Ur Rehman, Mehmoor Javed

Batters – Deependra Singh Shekhawat, Charles Fernando, Nicolo Fernando

All-Rounders – Waleed Rana (c), Arsalan Ali Rana, Rajmani Singh (vc)

Bowlers – Farhan Shafique, Jabrar Afzal, Sukhraj Singh

Suggested Playing XI No.2 for ROP vs PIA Dream11 Fantasy Cricket:

Keeper – Attiq Ur Rehman

Batters – Deependra Singh Shekhawat (vc), Charles Fernando (c), Nicolo Fernando, Nilantha Kotikawatta

All-Rounders – Waleed Rana, Jaspal Ram, Rajmani Singh

Bowlers – Farhan Shafique, Jabrar Afzal, Sukhraj Singh

Expert Advice:

It is advisable to pick Waleed Rana and Rajmani Singh as the captain and vice-captain of one of your Dream11 fantasy teams.

Today’s ROP vs PIA Probable Winners:

Royal Parma are expected to win this match.

Note: Updated Fantasy teams and Playing XIs of every match will be provided in our Telegram channel if the information is available.

Disclaimer: This team is based on the understanding, analysis, and instinct of the author. While selecting your team, consider the points mentioned and make your own decision.
